tha-ap24:8.1: Tathā → tattha (s2, s3, pts1, mr), bhūmi → nemi (bj) | kācehi (pts1)
tha-ap24:12.1: sattahi ratnehi → sattaratanehi (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap24:14.1: assumha → assumhā (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | āsimhā (?)
tha-ap24:19.2: akaruṃ te ca kañcukaṃ → akaruttarakañcukaṃ (bj) | ... akaruṃ tāva kañcukaṃ (s2, s3) | ... akaruttarakañcukaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap24:31.4: āloko hoti → ālokā honti (s2, s3, mr)
tha-ap24:38.4: kubbaṃ na tappare → kubbantanappakaṃ (bj) | kubbanti tappare (pts1)
